TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISponsor

summary.span: 指示该实施者希望成为生存期租约主办方。

span.span: Indicates that the implementer wants to be a lifetime lease sponsor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象必须实现接口是否需要请求租约续订特定对象。An object must implement the interface if it needs to request a lease renewal for a particular object. 实现的对象接口可能会变得发起人通过租用管理器中注册自身。An object that implements the interface can become a sponsor by registering itself with the lease manager. 生存期服务使用接口来回调到发起人。The interface is used by the lifetime service to call back to the sponsor. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ISponsor_Client#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ISponsor_Client/CPP/isponsor_client.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ISponsor_Client#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ISponsor_Client/CS/isponsor_client.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ISponsor_Client#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ISponsor_Client/VB/isponsor_client.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.TimeSpan Renewal(class System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease lease) cil managed
Public Function Renewal (lease As ILease) As TimeSpan

param.name: lease
param.span: 需要续订租约的对象的生存期租约。

span.span: The lifetime lease of the object that requires lease renewal.

summary.span: 请求发起客户端续订指定对象的租约。

span.span: Requests a sponsoring client to renew the lease for the specified object.

returns.span: 指定对象的附加租用时间。

span.span: The additional lease time for the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分布式的垃圾回收器，若要续订的租约指定的对象调用方法。The method is called by the distributed garbage collector to renew the lease for the specified object. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ISponsor_Client#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ISponsor_Client/CPP/isponsor_client.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ISponsor_Client#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ISponsor_Client/CS/isponsor_client.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ISponsor_Client#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ISponsor_Client/VB/isponsor_client.vb#2)]

exception.span: 直接调用方通过引用接口进行调用，且没有基础结构权限。

span.span: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.

permission.span: 用于操作基础结构代码。
